name: Karlson: Where is Billy?
description:
Explore, kill robot idiots, and save Billy! Billy was captured by the evil Dr. Robot, so its time for Karlson to save the day! We are also updating the game.

*Update-Server shutdown.

Fun fact: i started development 2 months ago, and i will need Dani´s help to make the game. So its still in development after 2 months!
